span.style: line-height: normal; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(7, 32, 129);

p.span: Welcome To the Jericho school district

span.style: text-transform: none; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: The Jericho Public Schools are committed to nurturing the individual capabilities and unique talents of all members of the educational community and preparing them for the rapid technological changes of the information age.

div.span: *instilling pride in personal and group achievement
*creating a strong sense of social responsibility
*building a caring community within its schools
